Label: Auroral Images, Key Parameters, IMAGE Far UltraViolet (FUV) Wide-band Imaging Camera (WIC) - S. Mende (UC/Berkeley/SSL)

VariableDescription.Name: WIC_PIXELS
VariableDescription.LongDescription: FUV/WIC LBH Auroral Images (raw cnts/14 bits, no grid, small format, linear scale)
